programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3391
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47134714
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep171172
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1851
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhangs custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. On his way to find Chi, Master Zhang arrives at a place where many people vanish for no reason. He soon discovers that it is Chi who captures them in his training to become a serpent demon. The war between human and demon has just begun!

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: When a man caught a fish from the lake and grilled it to eat, he heard a weird voice and saw a strange human face on the fish. Weird incidents occurred one after another, before a temple priest exorcises the malicious spirits brought on by the caught fish.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Hero Among Heroes
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung assists Lin Ze Xu to crack down the opium trading in Guangzhou. Barac provokes Beggar So to kill Wong and Lin as they hinder his opium business. When So finally resolves his misunderstanding with Wong, he decides to join Wong to defeat Barac and stop the opium import.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men 2
programme.desc: Continuing from Ah Boys to Men, Ken returns to barracks, determined to change because of his bedridden father, and becomes a model recruit. However, his comrades think Ken wants to flatter and show off only, and repel him. Although Ken wants to explain, misunderstanding gets deepen through days. Can they unite and overcome the challenge together?

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead
programme.desc: Kung fu comedy meets action as the Shaolin monks, Brother White and Brother Black, take on the evil King of the Vampires and his unstoppable army of Darkness.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, The Eagle Shooting Heroes is loosely based on Louis Chas classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hungs action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppys owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Rus financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the clients data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The House of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobras blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his fathers old rival.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Chik, one of the assassins of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to leave the clan when a kind family saved him. When pursued by the clan, a swordsman whose wife was killed by him saved his life. They decide to jointly take revenge on the clan.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: Super Police
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Film, Starring, Ram Charan, Priyanka Chopra, Mahie Gill, Sanjay Dutt & Others

programme.title: Dhillukku Dhuddu 2
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Comedy Film, Starring, Santhanam, Shritha Sivadas, Rajendran, T.M. Karthik Srinivasan, Kavitha Ranjini

programme.desc: Tamil Social Thriller Film, Starring, Ajith Kumar, Shraddha Srinath, Abhirami Venkatachalam, Andrea Tariang

programme.desc: Tamil Family Drama, Starring, Samuthirakani, Ramya Pandiyan, Sujatha Naidu, Hareesh Peradi, Radha Ravi & Others

programme.desc: Tamil Action drama film, Starring - Mahesh Babu, Keerthy Suresh & Samuthirakani

programme.title: Yaagaravaraiynum Naa Kaakka

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: I Love You
programme.desc: Santosh, a carefree youth, parts ways with his lover, Dharmika, during his college days. Years later, after his marriage to Gowri, he runs into her, which leaves him in a dilemma.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Devdas
programme.desc: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas's life spirals downward as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to alleviate the pain.

programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: Aditya, a heartbroken business tycoon, aimlessly boards a train to escape his depressing life. He meets Geet, a bubbly Punjabi girl, and gets pulled into her crazy life.

programme.title: Krishna Ka Badla
programme.desc: After the demise of his grandfather, a young man and his drama troupe decide to stage one last play to fulfil the former's wish. However, his decision ends up changing his life irrevocably.

programme.title: Romeo. Akbar. Walter.
programme.desc: A bank cashier, Romeo, is recruited by India's intelligence agency for espionage in Pakistan. However, he finds himself in challenging situations when his cover gets blown.

programme.title: Romeo. Akbar. Walter.
programme.desc: A bank cashier, Romeo, is recruited by India's intelligence agency for espionage in Pakistan. However, he finds himself in challenging situations when his cover gets blown.

programme.title: Abhimanyu
programme.desc: Abhimanyu, a professional computer engineer, puts his life at risk and fights for people from poverty-stricken areas so that they receive an education.

programme.title: Thackeray
programme.desc: Balasaheb Thackeray, a cartoonist with a no-nonsense personality, plays a key role in the birth of the Shiv Sena and goes on to become the most influential political leader in Maharashtra.

programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: Aditya, a heartbroken business tycoon, aimlessly boards a train to escape his depressing life. He meets Geet, a bubbly Punjabi girl, and gets pulled into her crazy life.

programme.title: Aiyyaa
programme.desc: An eccentric woman, Meenakshi, meets Surya, a Tamil artist, and is instantly attracted to him. Even when she gets engaged to Madhav, the ideal man, she still dreams of marrying Surya.

programme.title: Imtihan
programme.desc: Vicky, a popular singer, meets and falls in love with Preeti, who does not reciprocate his feelings but agrees to marry him. Soon, he realises that she is hiding something about her past.

programme.title: Aaj Ke Angaarey
programme.desc: Priya, a school teacher, and her class of 11 children participate in an inter-school competition and travel out of town. Along the way, a group of masked bandits stop their bus and take them hostage.

programme.title: Asoka
programme.desc: Asoka, the heir to the Maurya Empire, is sent on an exile for having fought with his half-brother, Susima. While travelling south, he meets Kaurwaki, princess of Kalinga, and falls for her.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: Three brothers, each raised in different religious households, reunite after many years in a chance encounter. They set out to take revenge on those responsible for separating them.

programme.title: Naqaab - Disguised Intentions
programme.desc: Sophia is engaged to millionaire Karan who is completely in love with her. However, when she meets her true love, Vicky, and starts seeing him secretly, her relationship with Karan suffers.

programme.title: Ishq Vishk
programme.desc: To gain popularity in his college and get a girlfriend, Rajiv lies to Payal about being in love with her. After he tries to molest her and she leaves him, Rajiv pursues another woman.

programme.title: Ishq Vishk
programme.desc: To gain popularity in his college and get a girlfriend, Rajiv lies to Payal about being in love with her. After he tries to molest her and she leaves him, Rajiv pursues another woman.

programme.title: Arjun Gowda
programme.desc: Arjun is a hot-headed young man who will do anything for the people he loves. When a figure from the underworld threatens his loved ones, he springs into action.

programme.title: Anjaam
programme.desc: Vijay, a wealthy man, is in love with Shivani and is heartbroken when she gets married to Ashok. Unable to forget her, Vijay turns into a psychopath and tries to disrupt her marriage.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: Three brothers, each raised in different religious households, reunite after many years in a chance encounter. They set out to take revenge on those responsible for separating them.

programme.title: Aatank Ki Jung
programme.desc: Meenakshi wants Zareen to help her take action against an ad agency owner, Gowtham. However, due to a turn of events, Meenakshi and Gowtham get intel on a terrorist attack and have to stop it.

programme.title: Jai Randal Maa
programme.desc: Goddess Randal, consort of the Sun God, assumes the form of a little girl to bless her followers. However, an evil presence plans to destroy Rupa, her greatest devotee.

programme.title: Karthikeya Mahima
programme.desc: An anthology of stories wherein ardent devotees of Kartikeya, the Hindu god of war, overcome various obstacles and succeed in their lives with the Almighty's help.

programme.title: Dashing Kundi
programme.desc: As Pramila arrives in NYC in search of employment, Vicky, a lover of adventure, helps her navigate some mortifying situations. She is smitten with him but is devastated when he does not reciprocate.

programme.title: Dil Hai Tumhaara
programme.desc: Shalu, a feisty young girl, falls in love with her employer's son, Dev. However, she decides to sacrifice her love after learning that her own sister, Nimmi, is also in love with him.

programme.title: Sonic The Hedgehog 2
programme.desc: The worlds favorite blue hedgehog is back! Dr. Robotnik returns, this time with help from Knuckles, in search of a powerful emerald. Sonic, along with his new sidekick Tails, embarks on a journey to stop Dr. Robotnik's plans before it's too late.

programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
programme.desc: A charming thief and a band of adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic. But things go awry when they cross the wrong people.

programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: A new threat from outer space sends heroes of Bricksburg, Emmet, Lucy and Batman on a mission to previously unknown worlds where their brain and brawn are tested.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell
programme.desc: An action-packed adventure set in a future world where people are enhanced with technology to fight the war against cyber-crime.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: A kid has the ability to turn into Shazam, an adult superhero. But he needs to master his powers quickly to fight the deadly forces of evil.

programme.title: Shazam! Fury Of The Gods
programme.desc: When the ancient gods, Daughters of Atlas, arrive on Earth in search of their stolen magic, Shazam and his family fight for the fate of the world.

programme.title: It Chapter Two
programme.desc: 27 years after he was defeated, Pennywise is back to terrorize the town of Derry. Now adults, the Losers come back to destroy him once and for all.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: Firestarter' follows a young girl (Ryan Kiera Armstrong) who develops pyrokinesis, attracting the attention of a secret government agency bent on exploiting her power as a weapon.

programme.title: Knowing

programme.title: Paw Patrol: The Movie

programme.title: Sonic The Hedgehog 2
programme.desc: The worlds favorite blue hedgehog is back! Dr. Robotnik returns, this time with help from Knuckles, in search of a powerful emerald. Sonic, along with his new sidekick Tails, embarks on a journey to stop Dr. Robotnik's plans before it's too late.

programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: A new threat from outer space sends heroes of Bricksburg, Emmet, Lucy and Batman on a mission to previously unknown worlds where their brain and brawn are tested.

programme.title: Transformers

programme.desc: Alicia Silverstone is Cher who believes in 'doing stuff for other people' but when it comes to matters of the heart, especially her own, she's clueless.

programme.desc: Packed with original songs by Jennifer Lopez and global Latin music star Maluma, 'Marry Me' features Lopez starring as musical superstar Kat Valdez and Owen Wilson as Charlie Gilbert, a math teachertotal strangers who agree to marry and then get to know each other. programme.desc: Community Mural - Friends on Sesame Street are painting a mural to celebrate the people in their neighborhood. programme.desc: A teenagers web of lies blows up in her face and threatens to destroy the lives of her older sister and mother. As the two siblings desperately try to clean up her mess, they find out the truth about their mother.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his companys most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: After taking the blame for the honor killing of his sister and serving his sentence, Yusuf must return to his family and brother who committed the murder. Yusuf struggles to reconcile family and tradition with the guilt and regret he feels over her death.

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: Adam is a young migrant who returns home to Poland for Christmas. He has a grand plan to convince his relatives to sell the family land so that he can start a new life abroad. But his dream comes with a hefty price tag that will change his family forever.

programme.title: The Coroner: Exquisite Corpse
programme.desc: Alexandra, a forensic pathologist, is determined to piece together her latest assignment; only the foot and leg of a murder victim has been found. With caution thrown to the wind, she faces the killer head-on in order to recover the rest of the body parts.

programme.title: The Coroner: A Leap Of Folly
programme.desc: A neurologist suddenly jumps off a bridge in front of his wife during a stroll. An autopsy shows that it was not suicide but a well-calibrated murder. With details still hazy, Alexander, the forensic pathologist, is pressured to come up with answers.

programme.title: Flesh Out
programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Veridas impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. IV - Borchert and the Force of Habit
programme.desc: Lawyer without a license Thomas Borchert wants to save two confessed burglars from a murder charge. But with the evidence stacked against them, their only hope is to track down the real killer themselves.

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: A teenagers web of lies blows up in her face and threatens to destroy the lives of her older sister and mother. As the two siblings desperately try to clean up her mess, they find out the truth about their mother.

programme.title: Dear Lemon Lima,
programme.desc: A bildungsroman of sorts, this film is the story of Vanessa, a 13 year old girl who, upon discovering her Eskimo heritage, bands together with her misfit friends to compete in the schools notorious winter competition so as to impress her crush.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: After taking the blame for the honor killing of his sister and serving his sentence, Yusuf must return to his family and brother who committed the murder. Yusuf struggles to reconcile family and tradition with the guilt and regret he feels over her death.

programme.title: I Was, I Am, I Will Be
programme.desc: Baran, a Kurdish gigolo seeking a better life in Europe meets Marion, a German pilot struggling with her cancer diagnosis. Entering into what was initially a sham marriage, the pair's relationship develops into something deeper.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over lifes troubles and silver linings.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Nicoline is the psychologist in charge of rehabilitating Idris, a serial sex offender. He tries hard to convince her of his renewed goodness, only to be constantly rejected by her. A disturbing but sickeningly alluring power play develops between them.

programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: Adam is a young migrant who returns home to Poland for Christmas. He has a grand plan to convince his relatives to sell the family land so that he can start a new life abroad. But his dream comes with a hefty price tag that will change his family forever.

programme.title: A Son
programme.desc: A familys holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Birth Of A Champion
programme.desc: In 1984 Germany, a hot-headed teenage Boris Becker has but one goal: to play tennis in the big leagues, and to be the best at it. Despite his temper, he is scouted by coach Gnther Bosch, who sees the future Wimbledon champion for what he is.

programme.title: Submission
programme.desc: Lcia is raped by her husband and presses charges against him. In her quest for justice, she must battle her husband who is the son of the State's Vice Attorney, and the Portuguese legal system with its patriarchal beliefs.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 07
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q and Murr invade a silent library to see who can make the most noise without getting into trouble. Plus, they search for their missing wives at the mall, and tonight's two losers get iced out by the New Jersey Devils.

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: When Juli meets Bryce in the second grade, she knows it's true love. After spending six years trying to convince Bryce the same, she's ready to give up - until he starts to reconsider.

programme.title: Friends S8 16
programme.desc: Guilt-ridden Joey finally confesses his love for Rachel to the flabbergasted Ross.

programme.title: Friends S8 17
programme.desc: Feeling awkward after revealing his romantic feelings to Rachel, Joey avoids contact with her.

programme.title: Friends S8 18
programme.desc: Monica becomes inarticulate while giving her toast at a anniversary party for her parents.

programme.title: Friends S8 19
programme.desc: Joey is thrilled when his name is used in a Soap Opera Digest crossword puzzle.

programme.title: Friends S8 20
programme.desc: Rachel panics during a party in anticipation of her baby's birth.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 8
programme.desc: Michael mystifies laundromat patrons by impossibly multiplying miniscule amounts of detergent, and makes one man's day when he convinces him that he's hit the coin machine jackpot. Then at a thrift store, Michael taps into his musical abilities by turning into a human record player. Plus, as an employee at a shipping store, he astonishingly flips a full bowl of punch without spilling a drop and repeatedly teleports a glass penguin to one customer's dismay.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 9
programme.desc: Michael confuses wine drinkers with an incredible shrinking bottle, and a supposedly deep cork that defies the laws of physics. Then, he bedazzles a jewelry store patron with disappearing diamonds. Later, he heads to the carwash where one woman takesa stand when her "go green" clean takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 10
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In The Carbonaro Effect, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 11
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In The Carbonaro Effect, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera.

programme.title: The Flash S9 6
programme.desc: Barry and Iris prepare for their new life. Luck changes for Central City. Cecile takes on a case with Allegras help. Chester works with Khione to figure out her abilities.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and 30 Rock's Tracy Morgan star as two longtime NYPD partners on the trail of a stolen, rare, mint-condition baseball card in the first major studio project from cult independent filmmaker Kevin Smith (Clerks, Chasing Amy). Willis plays the veteran detective whose missing collectible is his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, and Morgan is his "partner-against-crime." The two cops find themselves tangling with a merciless, memorabilia-obsessed gangster, rescuing a Mexican beauty with the key to millions in laundered drug money, and everything else that's not in a day's work for the detective duo.

programme.title: The Rite
programme.desc: "Choosing not to believe in the devil won't protect you from him." Academy Award winner Anthony Hopkins stars in this supernatural thriller that reveals the devil's reach to even one of the holiest places on earth. Inspired by true events chronicled by Rome-based journalist Matt Baglio, this exorcism drama follows a skeptical seminary student (Colin O'Donoghue) attending an exorcism school at the Vatican. While in Rome, he's sent to apprentice with an unorthodox priest (Hopkins) who introduces him to the darker side of his faith. Also starring I Am Legend's Alice Braga, Rome's Ciarn Hinds, Harry Potter's Toby Jones and Blade Runner's Rutger Hauer, this haunting chiller demonstrates how a disillusioned young priest ultimately finds his true faith by facing pure evil.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 13

programme.desc: It's been two years since the guys prowled the seamy side of Las Vegas in a roofie haze and recovered from being kidnapped, shot at and chased by drug-dealing mobsters in Bangkok. Phil, Stu and Doug are happily living uneventful lives at home. The only member of the Wolfpack who's not content is Alan. Still lacking a sense of purpose, the group's black sheep has ditched his meds and given in to his natural impulses in a big way which, for Alan, means no boundaries, no filters and no judgment until a personal crisis forces him to finally seek the help he needs. programme.desc: One for the Money - Five-O is called in when 72 employees of a family-owned million-dollar corporation are threatened with bodily harm, and the aging baroness of the corporation mysteriously disappears. McGarrett narrows his suspects to two nephews in competition for the family fortune.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep01
programme.desc: Hey, Look Me Over - When the nurses return from an evacuation they are dismayed at the mess left by the men who remained to receive the injured. While cleaning up after the men, the nurses find out they are being inspected by the dreaded Colonel Bucholtz; they have less than two days to prepare.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep02
programme.desc: Trick or Treatment - Halloween night and the M*A*S*H unit is hopping. A group of drunken Marines at Rosies bar end up in need of medical assistance when a series of fights break out at the bar. This adds to an already hectic night, with wounded arriving in droves from the front lines.

programme.title: Kenny Rogers as The Gambler
programme.desc: An Old West poker player, Kenny Rogers, acquaints Bruce Boxleitner and sets out to Texas to help the son he never knew.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep12
programme.desc: Prince Charmed - After Piper vanquishes a demon from Wyatt's room, she knows about the rest of her life concerning Wyatt. Paige and Phoebe decide to remind Piper of the importance of love by conjuring up a "Mr. Right."

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Used Karma - Jason breaks up with Phoebe when he finally learns her and her sisters are really witches. Richard attempts to free himself of his family's karma, and Piper and Paige try to vanquish a group of Swarm demons.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes Ep01
programme.desc: The Three Gables - Isadora rejects Douglas Maberley, in favour of the young Duke of Lomond. Douglas dies after he completes the manuscript of his life story. Mary calls in Holmes to investigate his death.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes Ep02
programme.desc: The Dying Detective - Holmes gets a visit from Adelaide Savage who is worried about her husband Victor's increasing habit of smoking opium to heighten his powers for writing poetry.

programme.title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes Ep03
programme.desc: The Golden Pince Nez - Inspector Hopkins asks Holmes to investigate when Willoughby Smith, secretary to Professor Coram, is found dead clutching a pince-nez.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Pilot - The pilot episode of the long-running comedy series about the staff of an old-fashioned department store, Grace Brothers. Trouble is afoot when the Ladies Department and Gentlemen's Outfitting are told they must share the same floor.

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Dear Sexy Knickers - Mr Lucas fancies Miss Brahms. No surprise there. He decides to write a love letter to her, but the letter falls into the hands of an altogether different woman, Mrs Slocombe!

programme.title: Are You Being Served? S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Our Figures Are Slipping - Sales figures are dropping in Ladieswear and Gentlemen's Outfitting. Viewing the store as a battlefield, Mr Rumbold calls a sales conference after the store closes, and instructs the staff on new sales techniques.

programme.title: Frasier S1 Ep19

programme.desc: We Dream Of Machine Elves - Rollins goes undercover to find a suspect who is drugging and assaulting tourists, while Benson helps the victims sort out their memories from their hallucinations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep9
programme.desc: Can't Be Held Accountable - A fellow detective asks the SVU for help when he suspects his two daughters are being groomed by a serial predator. Kat disobeys the Captain's orders.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S21 Ep10
programme.desc: Must Be Held Accountable - A desperate father takes matters into his own hands in the case against his daughter's rapist.

programme.title: Framed By My Sister
programme.desc: The families of twin sisters are infiltrated by a mysterious triplet, who was separated from them at birth by their adopted mother. She frames one of the twins for murdering the other's husband and then assumes the identity of the widow. Can she succeed?

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep17
programme.desc: The Fighting Irish - Jack welcomes his brother Eddie (Special Guest Star Nathan Lane) into the 'TGS' family.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep18
programme.desc: Fireworks - Jack (Alec Baldwin) turns to Kenneth (Jack McBrayer) for help when an aggressive West Coast NBC exec (Special Guest Star Will Arnett) declares he's after Donaghy's job.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep1
programme.desc: Dead Man's Hand - When a close friend meets an untimely end, Charlie Cale, a casino cocktail waitress with an uncanny knack for identifying lies, is determined to unravel these mysterious events, even if it endangers her own life.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep2
programme.desc: The Night Shift - Wounded and on the run, Charlie is forced to make a pit stop in desolate New Mexico where she tries to clear the name of a trucker framed for the murder of a local.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep3
programme.desc: The Stall - Charlie takes a job at a family-run Texas BBQ joint and must use her skills of perception to sniff out the truth behind a shocking death.

programme.title: Poker Face Ep4
programme.desc: Rest In Metal - Charlie goes on tour with has-been metal band Doxxxology, a motley crew of dejected rockers whove spent decades trying to write a new hit; Charlie suspects foul play when one musician winds up dead.

programme.title: Tarzan
programme.desc: Raised by gorillas in a remote part of Africa, Tarzan must protect his jungle and Jane from greedy New York City businessmen who want to destroy his jungle home for profit in this stunning CGI-animated family adventure.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep9
programme.desc: This Could Be The Start Of Something New - Will relies on Crockett and Meds newly donated OR 2.0 to save his patient. Charles helps an elderly confused patient whos mourning the loss of his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Everyone's Fighting A Battle You Know Nothing About - Will, Crockett and Justin Lieu (a new first-year resident) try to facilitate a trans-organ exchange.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep9
programme.desc: This Could Be The Start Of Something New - Will relies on Crockett and Meds newly donated OR 2.0 to save his patient. Charles helps an elderly confused patient whos mourning the loss of his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: This critically acclaimed film starring Naomi Watts and Ewan McGregor is based on the true story of one family caught in one of the worst natural catastrophes of our time, the 2004 tsunami that devastated Southeast Asia.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep1

programme.desc: Everyone's Fighting A Battle You Know Nothing About - Will, Crockett and Justin Lieu (a new first-year resident) try to facilitate a trans-organ exchange.

programme.title: SurrealEstate Ep2
programme.desc: The Harvey - A little boy's "imaginary friend" interferes with his parents' plans to sell their house and move.

programme.title: SurrealEstate Ep3
programme.desc: For Sale By Owner - A lovely lake cabin may be haunted or the owner may be faking; a horror novelist seeks inspiration.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep16
programme.desc: The Source Awards - Jack forces Tracy to attend The Source Awards, while Kenneth the Page catches the eye of a hip-hop star's girlfriend -- with special guest stars LL Cool J, Wayne Brady and Ghostface Killah.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep2
programme.desc: 6 more disguised celebrities take to the stage, Pearly King, Onomatopoeia, Pig, Sea Slug, Cactus, and Tomato Sauce. Panellists Jonathan Ross, Davina McCall, Peter Crouch and Oti Mabuse try to work out who is behind the mask.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep3
programme.desc: 5 of the remaining disguised celebrities return to the stage. 2 of the masked performers will have to compete in a dance-off with 1 surviving with their identity still hidden and the loser being unmasked.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Five of the masked dancers, Pearly King, Onomatopoeia, Tomato Sauce, Sea Slug and Cactus, return to the stage to perform a new routine. Two will face each other in a dance off with one eliminated and unmasked.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep5
programme.desc: All of the remaining participants, Sea Slug, Pearly King, Onomatopoeia, Tomato Sauce, Pillar and Post, Oddsocks, Scissors and Candlestick compete in this edition of the masked celebrity dance competition.

programme.title: The Masked Dancer U.K. S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Six Masked Dancers remain as the nation's favourite guessing game continues - this time will see the seventh celebrity unmasked and their identity revealed.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Mamma Said There Would Be Days Like This - Crockett adjusts to his newfound fame when he helps Will treat a local restaurant owner.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep7
programme.desc: The Clothes Make The Man... Or Do They? - Med runs out of scrubs, forcing the staff to improvise. The life of Archers son is in danger.

programme.title: Chicago Med S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Everyone's Fighting A Battle You Know Nothing About - Will, Crockett and Justin Lieu (a new first-year resident) try to facilitate a trans-organ exchange.

programme.title: 30 Rock Ep19
programme.desc: Corporate Crush - Liz finds love while Jack fights to keep his job.

programme.title: Accused Ep7
programme.desc: Brenda's Story - When an acerbic female stand-up comic reports she was sexually assaulted at her friend's party, the DA decides her highly questionable past, and reputation obfuscates a conviction and drops all charges against the suspect. Enraged, the comedian uses her platform to try the case in the court of public opinion.

programme.title: Accused Ep8
programme.desc: Laura's Story - A grieving mother learns that facts and evidence are no match for viral misinformation when she discovers a growing online conspiracy that denies the reality that her son died in a mass shooting. When she engages with the online trolls to set the record straight, she becomes consumed by an endless crusade that tears her family apart.

programme.title: Accused Ep9
programme.desc: Jack's Story - A teacher is accused of statutory rape when he helps a student cross state lines to get an abortion.

programme.title: Accused Ep10
programme.desc: Esme's Story - After a white national plows his car into a peaceful demonstration and gets away, local police are unable to find the driver. A survivor from the incident takes justice into her own hands when she identifies a possible suspect on the dark web and uses her girlfriend as bait in order to infiltrate the group.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs
programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

programme.desc: Socks - Gregg Wallace gets to grips with socks at a factory in Leicester.

programme.title: The Hunt S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Nowhere to Hide - This episode explores how predators must make their own opportunities when hunting in wide expanses of land like the desert or grassland.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Peru - Robson's next stop is Peru, where he will fish the world's largest river, its largest ocean, and one of its highest mountain ranges.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep3
programme.desc: Yogurt - Gregg Wallace visits a factory in rural Somerset that produces one million pots of yogurt every 24 hours.

programme.title: Cheetah Family & Me S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Renowned wildlife film-maker Gordon Buchanan gets close to wild cheetah in the stunning Kalahari, experiencing first-hand the very real dangers these beautiful big cats face.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Actor Charlie Hardwick shows Robson the hidden gems of the east Durham coastline, taking an art class on the sand and attending an outdoor singing session.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Robson is joined by author LJ Ross on a trip along the Northumbrian coast. They visit Holy Island - the setting for Ross's first novel - and sign up for a Nordic walking lesson.

programme.title: Chasing Monsters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Deadly Jaws - The Congo is one of Africa's wildest rivers and the fish that swim in its waters are even wilder. At 100 lbs, the scary looking goliath tiger fish is certainly one of the world's most fearsome creatures.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Michael B. Jordan - Actor Michael B. Jordan joins Grylls in Wales where they start their journey by dropping into rough waters off the coast before making their way up the coast and to the top of the mountains for their exit.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentinas coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Marias side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dora the Baby Muriqui - Feel the enchantment of Brazils Atlantic Forest as southern muriqui Dora takes her first steps away from mum Mimi. Get lessons in spider monkey troop dynamics, bone up on tail-hanging technique, and see this baby find her place among her peers.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Life Begins - For the first few weeks of life, the world is a frightening place. Danger lurks around every corner. It pays to be alert. Whether predator or prey. Any day might be your last. The race is on to grow up fast- for even the largest animals are vulnerable to attack.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life's Lessons - If young animals survive until adulthood, the chances for survival are greatly increased - but many challenges face them before they can strike out on their own. Some have months to grow-up; other have decades but all, have lots to learn along the way. From getting to grips with their bodies and learning to feed themselves, to practicing fighting skills and learning how to form friendships. There are many hurdles along the way, but every small success could mean the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Life's Journey 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Life's Legacies - For every species on earth the right to mate is the purpose of life. Passing on your genes to the next generation is every animals legacy. But its not easy, it can be a struggle to find a mate and then a fight to gain access. Only the strongest and most determined will win at Luangwas mating game.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the center, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Little Penguin - Follow the story of Harry and Sally, a pair of little penguins. These flightless, flippered birds create some of the noisiest neighborhoods in nature. Theirs is a family saga of faithful relationships, committed homemaking, and vigorous nightlife.

programme.title: Wild Birds of Australia 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Secret Life of the Emu - The Emu is Australias biggest native bird and is the second largest bird in the world after the African ostrich: two meters tall, with an almost three metre running stride and totally flightless. This bird inhabits a topsy turvy world, where females call the shots, eggs are green and men do all the work to produce and raise tiny babies, known as Stripeys.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, whos honing her survival skills in Brazils Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentinas coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Marias side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Africa's Big Cats - South Africas Kruger National Park is one of the largest game reserves on the continent. It contains diverse habitats and is home to hundreds of species of mammals, birds, and reptiles This abundance of animals means many predators, including Africas big cats.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Follow an injured opossum into surgery, as the medical team realizes amputation may be the only way to save his badly injured toe. And meet some turtle hatchlings who seem ready for release when the team gets disappointing details about their size.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Frida the Jaguar Cub - Test limits with jaguar cub Frida, whos honing her survival skills in Brazils Caiman Lodge Reserve. Learn how to sneak with mum Gatuna, see sister Anouk help her hide from hungry interlopers, and go on a reckless solo trek that takes a lucky turn.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Meet a flock of cedar waxwings who have taken over the centers aviary and are keeping the staff busy with endless demands for food. Then the rescue team works with the Ministry of Natural Resources to relocate a coyote thats too people-friendly.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Join the rescue team for a madcap chase after a red-tailed hawk. He may be unable to fly, but he sure can run! Then follow the recovery of a rare albino squirrel who cant walk, and see how the medical team ensures hell be ready for the wild again.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mexico - The mythology of Mexicos Yucatan Peninsula includes a protective Earth Mother figure, Ixchel, who brings fertility and healing to the region. In the shadow of Ixchel, we witness an ancient birthing ritual happening yearly on Mexican beaches: mother green sea turtles haul themselves onto the sands and bury their clutches of eggs.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - South Luangwa National Park is one of Africas great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africas Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. The fortune of every animal that lives here is inextricably linked to the two vastly different seasons they experience the wet and the dry.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Lola the Sea Lion Pup - Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentinas coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Marias side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Start of Trauma Season - Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Operation Pelican - Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.desc: Check in with the centres resident turkey vulture, whos ready for release and in search of a flock. While Nathalie and her team rush to secure funding for a new facility, the medical team is baffled by a toad who has mysteriously taken ill.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Crossing the Danakil - The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hawaii - Throughout the Hawaiian Islands, natural forces of creation and destruction can be observed in real-time as they work to shape the living beach. These beaches are forged inside active volcanoes: every bit of land exists here because of these red-hot furnaces.

programme.title: Deadly Australians 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Forests - Australia is home to the world's most toxic, venomous and dangerous creatures. From the oceans to the forest, swamps and deserts, it's a continent teeming with a hugely disproportionate number of creatures that can bite, poison or maim.

programme.desc: In the Byzantine city of Ravenna, Rick discovers piadinas; street food dating back to Roman times. Then in Croatia, he discovers new dishes like pasticada, goat stew with peas, and lamb peka.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S5 Ep11
programme.desc: It's Chocolate Day. As the final ten junior bakers return to the tent, they are faced with a delicious, indulgent technical challenge.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Didsbury and Streatham - George is in Manchester to drag an Arts and Crafts-inspired Edwardian home kicking and screaming into the modern day. And in London he meets Flo, a first-time buyer whose 1930s flat needs a rejig to make it the sociable space she's longing for.

programme.title: Rick Stein: From Venice to Istanbul S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the Byzantine city of Ravenna, Rick discovers piadinas; street food dating back to Roman times. Then in Croatia, he discovers new dishes like pasticada, goat stew with peas, and lamb peka.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S8 Ep4
programme.desc: Scraps are put to use in Reduce, Reuse, Recycle week to create quilted patchwork jackets. Old coats are given a new lease of life and second-hand duvets become maxi dresses.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Donal and Max are steering their way to the Ancient East, a land of myths and legends and food traditions but first up Donal takes to the sky to battle a great fear of heights at Carlingford Adventure Centre.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep2
programme.desc: It's chicken week, and the cooks compete to get their marinades on Nando's menus in over 450 restaurants across the nation. But when service begins, one cook is missing in action.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S5 Ep12
programme.desc: The remaining junior bakers must go global - having their skills tested in tricky international challenges. The pressure is on in the technical challenge.

programme.title: Grand Designs S20 Ep6
programme.desc: In Dunstable, John and his wife Helen demolish an old, dilapidated house and in its place build a million-pound, high-tech, accessible glass pavilion, complete with wildlife garden.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Donal and Max are steering their way to the Ancient East, a land of myths and legends and food traditions but first up Donal takes to the sky to battle a great fear of heights at Carlingford Adventure Centre.

programme.title: Next Level Chef UK S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Final - Three incredible chefs have cooked their way through the extraordinary culinary gauntlet to reach the Final, but which of them will be crowned as the first-ever winner?

programme.title: Evil Things S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Christmas Gift And Stolen Time - An unexpected Christmas gift turns to terror during a camping trip with friends. Plus, a gold pocket watch puts a mans life in danger.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Alcatraz Conjoined Twins And Lincoln Grave Robbery - Don Wildman unearths four dummy heads that helped three inmates escape from Alcatraz, examines the medical mystery that defined a famous pair of conjoined twins

programme.title: The Alaska Triangle S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Alaskan Titanic - In 1918 the SS Princess Sophia was mysteriously sank near Juneau, Alaska.

programme.title: Booze Traveler S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Brazil - Jack Maxwell heads to Brazil to taste the country's national spirit, Cachaca, and discovers other adventures along the way

programme.title: Extreme Hotels S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Totally Bizarre - Host Anthony Melchiorri treks across land and sea to visit outrageous hotels all over the world.

programme.title: Hotel Impossible S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Airing The Family Business - Anthony helps a stubborn owner leave the laundry room to manage her hotel.

programme.title: Tales From The Explorers Club S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Explorers Club At The Movies - Josh Gates explores how club members' exploits inspired Hollywood, including how a bullwhip-cracking archaeologist may be the real-life Indiana Jones.

programme.title: American Monster S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Live By The Sword - It's a tough but happy life for the Williams until Manling returns home to find her family slaughtered - at sword point.

programme.title: Top Secret Swimming Holes S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fiji's Saw-I-Lau Caves - Join a trek to Colorado, Fiji and more to find the most incredible swimming holes.

programme.title: Destination Fear S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Old Historic Harriman Hospital - Tanner discovers deserted Tennessee hospital. Rumours of hauntings surround around this unexplored facility - can the team unlock its secrets?

programme.title: Ghost Hunters S14 Ep12
programme.desc: Tortured Souls Of Cresson - The Ghost Brothers and Dustin Pari join TAPS to investigate a sanatorium in rural Pennsylvania. This historic property is plagued by unnerving activity.

programme.title: Kindred Spirits S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Shadow In The Night - Amy, Adam and Chip help a mother and her children who are haunted by a terrifying shadow figure. Could the entity be tied to a nearby penitentiary?

programme.desc: Christmas Gift And Stolen Time - An unexpected Christmas gift turns to terror during a camping trip with friends. Plus, a gold pocket watch puts a mans life in danger.

programme.desc: When Shadows Attack - A Tennessee couple is forced to move back into a haunted house for financial reasons.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep25
programme.desc: The Phantom Of Club Moist - King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep26
programme.desc: King Juli-End - King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep3
programme.desc: Clubbing - Homesick, Cleo tries joining some school clubs to feel better. Her homesickness has an unexpected and destructive effect.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep4
programme.desc: Humility - Cleos over confidence gets her friends captured, and to rescue them she must convince a tribe of laidback aliens she can master their high values of humility, serenity, and caution.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare hell never forget!

programme.desc: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2 - When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep25
programme.desc: Maces And Talons Pt 1 - When they learn the Dragon Hunters are tracking the Flightmare, Hiccup and Astrid race to stop them after Heather spills secrets from Viggo Grimborn

programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.
